  <h3 style="margin:6px 0 10px;">ğŸ‚ è·ç¦»å¦ç¦ç”Ÿæ—¥è¿˜æœ‰</h3>

<script>
const BIRTH_MM = 10, BIRTH_DD = 30;

// å–â€œç°åœ¨â€çš„åŒ—äº¬æ—¶é—´
function beijingNow() {
  return new Date(new Date().toLocaleString('en-US', { timeZone: 'Asia/Shanghai' }));
}

// è®¡ç®—ç›®æ ‡æ—¶åˆ»ä¸â€œä»Šå¤©æ˜¯å¦ç”Ÿæ—¥â€
function getTargetAndFlag() {
  const nowBJ = beijingNow();
  const y = nowBJ.getFullYear();

  const isToday = (nowBJ.getMonth() + 1 === BIRTH_MM) && (nowBJ.getDate() === BIRTH_DD);
  if (isToday) return { target: null, isBirthdayToday: true };

  // ä¸æ˜¯å½“å¤©ï¼šç›®æ ‡ = ä»Šå¹´ 10/30 00:00ï¼ˆåŒ—äº¬æ—¶é—´ï¼‰ï¼›è‹¥å·²è¿‡åˆ™è·³åˆ°æ˜å¹´
  const mm = String(BIRTH_MM).padStart(2,'0');
  const dd = String(BIRTH_DD).padStart(2,'0');
  let target = new Date(`${y}-${mm}-${dd}T00:00:00+08:00`);
  const now = new Date();
  if (target <= now) target = new Date(`${y+1}-${mm}-${dd}T00:00:00+08:00`);
  return { target, isBirthdayToday: false };
}

const { target, isBirthdayToday } = getTargetAndFlag();
const el  = document.getElementById('countdown');
const tip = document.getElementById('countdown-date');

function pad(n){ return String(n).padStart(2,'0'); }

function render(){
  if (isBirthdayToday){
    el.textContent = 'ğŸ‰ ç”Ÿæ—¥å¿«ä¹ï¼Happy Birthday!';
    el.style.fontSize = '1.6rem';
    tip.textContent = 'ä»Šå¤©æ˜¯åŒ—äº¬æ—¶é—´çš„ 10 æœˆ 30 æ—¥';
    return;
  }
  const now = new Date();
  let ms = target - now;
  if (ms <= 0){
    el.textContent = 'ğŸ‰ ç”Ÿæ—¥å¿«ä¹ï¼Happy Birthday!';
    el.style.fontSize = '1.6rem';
    return;
  }
  const sec = Math.floor(ms/1000);
  const d = Math.floor(sec / 86400);
  const h = Math.floor((sec % 86400) / 3600);
  const m = Math.floor((sec % 3600) / 60);
  const s = sec % 60;
  el.textContent = `${d} å¤© ${pad(h)}:${pad(m)}:${pad(s)}`;

  // ç›®æ ‡æ—¶åˆ»ï¼ˆåŒ—äº¬æ—¶é—´ï¼‰çš„äººç±»å¯è¯»æ˜¾ç¤º
  try {
    const fmt = new Intl.DateTimeFormat('zh-CN', {
      timeZone: 'Asia/Shanghai',
      dateStyle: 'full',
      timeStyle: 'short'
    });
    tip.textContent = 'ï¼ˆåŒ—äº¬æ—¶é—´ï¼‰ï¼š' + fmt.format(target);
  } catch(e) {
    tip.textContent = 'ï¼ˆåŒ—äº¬æ—¶é—´ï¼‰ï¼š10-30';
  }
}

render();
const timer = setInterval(render, 1000);
</script>

<script>
(function(){

  const imgs = [

  ];

  function mkBtn(txt, side){

  }
  const prev = mkBtn('â€¹', 'left');

  // é€»è¾‘
